name: arrayFilter
description: Used to filter an array to items for which the closure function returns true.

params.name: callback
params.description: Inline closure function executed for each element in the array. Returns true if the array element should be included in the filtered array. Support for passing the original array to the closure function added in CF11 Update 5.

params.name: parallel
params.description: Lucee4.5+ true if the items can be executed in parallel

params.name: maxThreads
params.description: Lucee4.5+ the maximum number of threads to use when parallel = true
